tasks.name: CDP WebSocket Server
tasks.description: Implement WebSocket server for Chrome DevTools Protocol. Handles bidirectional communication with DevTools frontend on port 9222.
acceptance_criteria: Clean connection close with status codes

tasks.name: CDP Protocol Handler
tasks.description: Implement message routing and handling for Chrome DevTools Protocol. Parse incoming CDP messages and route to appropriate domain handlers.
acceptance_criteria: Parse CDP messages with id, method, params
Route messages to correct domain handler

tasks.name: Session Management
tasks.description: Manage DevTools client sessions. Track connected clients, session state, and handle connection lifecycle.
acceptance_criteria: Create unique session for each connection

tasks.name: Browser Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Browser domain. Provides browser version info, command line arguments, and crash dumps.

tasks.name: DOM Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP DOM domain. Provides DOM tree inspection, node manipulation, and query selector support.

tasks.name: CSS Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP CSS domain. Provides stylesheet inspection, computed styles, and live CSS editing.

tasks.name: Network Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Network domain. Monitor HTTP requests/responses, enable request interception, and cache inspection.

tasks.name: Runtime Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Runtime domain. JavaScript expression evaluation, remote object inspection, and console integration.

tasks.name: Debugger Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Debugger domain. Breakpoint management, stepping, call stack inspection, and scope evaluation.
acceptance_criteria: Set and remove breakpoints at source locations
View call stack with local variables
implementation_hints: Implement Chrome DevTools Protocol (CDP) for compatibility
Use V8 debugging API for breakpoints and stepping
Maintain mapping from source locations to bytecode offsets

common_pitfalls.solution: Verify source location mapping, check line numbers
Ensure evaluation uses correct call frame context

tasks.name: Console Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Console domain. Console message handling, log levels, and message formatting.

tasks.name: Profiler Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Profiler domain. CPU profiling, code coverage analysis.

tasks.name: HeapProfiler Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP HeapProfiler domain. Memory profiling, heap snapshots, and allocation tracking.

tasks.name: Security Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Security domain. Certificate inspection, security state, and CSP violation reporting.

tasks.name: Storage Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Storage domain. Cookies, LocalStorage, SessionStorage, and IndexedDB inspection.

tasks.name: Emulation Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Emulation domain. Device emulation, viewport sizing, and media type override.
acceptance_criteria: Set device metrics (viewport size, pixel ratio)

tasks.name: Page Domain
tasks.description: Implement CDP Page domain. Page navigation, lifecycle events, and screenshot capture.

tasks.name: DOM Inspector Bridge
tasks.description: Bridge between DevTools and DOM component. Set up mutation observers and convert DOM events to CDP events.

tasks.name: Network Inspector Bridge
tasks.description: Bridge between DevTools and Network stack. Track requests, responses, and timing information.

tasks.name: JavaScript Debug Bridge
tasks.description: Bridge between DevTools and JavaScript runtime. Handle breakpoints, stepping, and evaluation.

tasks.name: Render Inspector Bridge
tasks.description: Bridge between DevTools and Render engine. Provide layout information and visual inspection.

tasks.name: Storage Bridge
tasks.description: Bridge between DevTools and Storage system. Access cookies, localStorage, IndexedDB.

tasks.name: Elements Inspector
tasks.description: Elements panel functionality. DOM tree view, computed styles, and box model visualization.
acceptance_criteria: Show computed styles for selected element
Display matched CSS rules with specificity

common_pitfalls.issue: Styles not updating on CSS changes

common_pitfalls.solution: Use absolute positioning, update on scroll

tasks.name: Layout Inspector
tasks.description: Layout inspection including box model, flexbox, and grid overlays.

tasks.name: Accessibility Inspector
tasks.description: Accessibility tree inspection and ARIA validation.

tasks.name: Breakpoint Management
tasks.description: Set, remove, and manage JavaScript breakpoints with conditional support.

tasks.name: Step Execution Controls
tasks.description: Debugger stepping: step over, step into, step out, continue.

tasks.name: Scope Inspection
tasks.description: Inspect variable scopes when paused: local, closure, global.

tasks.name: Source Map Support
tasks.description: Load and apply source maps for transpiled/bundled JavaScript.

tasks.name: Request Interception
tasks.description: Intercept and modify network requests before they are sent.

tasks.name: Cache Inspection
tasks.description: Inspect browser cache contents and manage cached resources.

tasks.name: WebSocket Frame Inspection
tasks.description: Monitor WebSocket connections and inspect frames.

tasks.name: CPU Profiler
tasks.description: Record and analyze CPU usage and call tree.

tasks.name: Memory Profiler
tasks.description: Track memory allocation and detect leaks.

tasks.name: Timeline Recording
tasks.description: Record and visualize browser timeline events.

tasks.name: Code Coverage
tasks.description: Track JavaScript and CSS code coverage.

tasks.name: JavaScript REPL
tasks.description: Interactive JavaScript console with history and autocomplete.

tasks.name: Log Management
tasks.description: Console log collection, filtering, and persistence.

tasks.name: Object Preview Generation
tasks.description: Generate preview representations of JavaScript objects.

tasks.name: Origin Validation
tasks.description: WebSocket origin security validation for DevTools connections.

tasks.name: CDP Message Validation
tasks.description: Validate and sanitize incoming CDP messages for security.

tasks.name: Message Batching
tasks.description: Batch CDP events for improved throughput.

tasks.name: Remote Object Caching
tasks.description: Cache remote object references for performance.

tasks.name: CDP Compliance Test Suite
tasks.description: Comprehensive test suite for Chrome DevTools Protocol compliance.

tasks.name: BrowserComponent Trait Implementation
tasks.description: Implement BrowserComponent trait for DevTools integration with browser shell.

tasks.name: DevTools Public API
tasks.description: Public API for DevTools: start server, connect components, get URLs.
